name: Weather Dashboard
description: Implement weather tracking with manual logging, historical data, and growing condition analysis

turns.prompt: Create the Weather module for HomesteadHub. Since this might run offline, support both manual weather logging and optional API integration. Build API routes at /api/weather for WeatherLogs: date, temperatureHigh, temperatureLow, humidity, precipitation (inches), windSpeed, conditions (sunny, cloudy, rainy, stormy, snowy), notes. Include a route to fetch from OpenWeatherMap API if configured (check for API key in env).
turns.expectedBehavior: Creates weather API routes, manual entry support, conditional OpenWeatherMap integration with graceful fallback if no API key

turns.prompt: Build the weather dashboard at /weather with: current conditions card (today's entry or API data), 7-day history chart showing temperature range and precipitation, monthly summary statistics (average temps, total precipitation, growing degree days calculation). Use a charting library like Recharts.
turns.expectedBehavior: Creates src/app/weather/page.tsx with current conditions display, Recharts line/bar chart for history, monthly stats calculation including GDD

turns.prompt: Add a manual weather logging form that's easy to fill out daily. Include presets for common conditions, auto-fill from yesterday's data as starting point, and a quick-log button on the dashboard. Also add a historical data import feature for CSV files with date, high, low, precipitation columns.
turns.expectedBehavior: Creates quick-log form with presets, yesterday's data prefill, CSV import with validation and preview before committing

turns.prompt: Create a growing conditions analyzer that: calculates frost-free days, tracks growing degree days (GDD) for common crops, predicts first/last frost based on historical data, and shows which plants are in danger when temperature drops below 32F. Integrate this with the Garden module to show warnings on plant cards.
turns.expectedBehavior: Creates GrowingConditions component/service with frost calculations, GDD tracking, frost prediction algorithm, integration with plant display showing frost warnings

taskCompleted.description: Weather system with logging, dashboard, charts, and growing analysis
taskCompleted.validation: Manual logging works, charts display correctly, GDD calculates properly

contextRetained.description: Weather integrates with Garden module for frost warnings, uses consistent theming
contextRetained.validation: Plant cards show frost warnings, charts use earthy color scheme

codeWorks.description: GDD calculation is accurate, frost prediction uses sound algorithm
codeWorks.validation: TypeScript compiles, math calculations verified against known formulas
